name: AuraFrames(Lite)
0:
”Alexa, next on home”
”Alexa, previous on home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Limited control of your Aura frame using Alexa voice commands. Manage a single Aura frame, or switch between multiple frames within your Aura account. This skill only allows next / previous photo. Aura frame device and account required.
